item.title: FAQ
item.description: How do I resolve Terraform binary not being located when running export or import commands? Example Error Output: [INFO] command: terraform --version [ERROR] cat: /root/.tfenv/version: No such file or directory [ERROR] Version could not be resolved (set by /root/.tfenv/version or tfenv use <version>) Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/local/bin/databricks-sync", line 8, in <module> sys.exit(cli()) Using tfenv install <version> will automatically place the Terraform binary in the Bin directory if one version exists.
